website_summaries.verdict: This option features a comfortable and lightweight low profile at a decent price.
pros: Bluetooth wireless, with a 10-hour battery life
Features include a built-in mic and remote
Buttons control the music, or you can answer and end calls
cons: does not come with an optional AUX cord
Some reports that this option stopped working within a few weeks

customer_reviews.title: We both bought them!
customer_reviews.text: We love these. So much we bought this second pair. As avid workout enthusiasts corded headphones were just not cutting it and these were the perfect solution. My husband is a picky man with serious quality concerns when it comes to anything related to the way he listens to music. I am not so picky and bought the first pair on clearance at a major retail chain known for low prices. He tried mine and decided right then and there to order his own here. Would absolutely buy again, comfort, price, sound quality, ease of use, long charge, easy sync for music and calls, perfect! We both also really love the white color with red, black and grey accents.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't live up to the Skullcandy name.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter go these for her birthday in June. They worked great in the beginning and she used the all of the time and I loved how portable they were, without the additional hassle of cords. They no longer hold a charge and are useless. Not what I expected from the Skullcandy brand. The return window has passed and she's only had them for FOUR months. Absolute bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lund

customer_reviews.title: Like a Steve Jobs design. Simple, elegant, excellent sound.
customer_reviews.text: I've probably bought five or six pairs of relatively inexpensive headphones in the past year, looking for something easy and comfortable. These are absolutely, far and away the best design of anything I've tried. The volume control is easy and intuitive. I would buy them again just for this. They are light and comfortable and feel sturdy. Really, they are pretty amazing design-wise. The sound is excellent with good bass. It paired easily and very quickly with both my iphone and my pc. These are the white, gray and red Uproar, wireless ones. I'm pretty stoked.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: ... Skullycandy products -- the sound quality of these was pretty good, and the range was decent too
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a fan of Skullycandy products -- the sound quality of these was pretty good, and the range was decent too. After a few months of use though they completely stopped working though (they take a charge and they'll connect to my devises but it just makes a cracking noise).. I don't know if other people have experienced that.
customer_reviews.author: MKEswimmer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have a small head
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent headphone and worth the money. I wear a 7 1/4 inch hat and I found them to be somewhat uncomfortable and too tight, my wife, on the other hand, likes the way they fit. Also, the max volume seems lower than other headphones I have owned, probably high enough for most but just something to be aware of if you are used to really cranking it up. I found the sound to be decent and the bass acceptable. If you are in the market for wireless headphones in this price range, I say, give them a try.
customer_reviews.author: Eunos09

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. Got them for my gf, and she loves them even though the white ones look like a little kids' toy. They sound decent and the microphone sounds just as loud and clear as if she is speaking directly into her phone. If you want to spend more money, you can get some features that these do NOT have: -optional corded sound/mic, which can be helpful when having BT connectivity issues -noise cancelling/ ambient sound cancelling for the mic
customer_reviews.author: BoCo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!! Totally comfortable, great quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these!!!!! The sound quality is ahhhhhhmazing!!! And extremely comfortable!! I wear these for hours!! After about 6 hours my ears get a little warm 😂😂😂 and I have to take them off for about 10-15mins then I'm good to go for another 6 hours!!! And I've had these for a while so theyve held up winderfully compared to a few others I've had that broke (I won't mention brand names but they were are waaaaaaay more expensive and I was super ticked when they broke!!) These are a great buy!!!!!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: plussizegodess

customer_reviews.title: OK for music, bad for phone
customer_reviews.text: Audio quality in is decent, not sure work the price as I've purchased better sounding bluetooth headsets for the same or less. The control buttons are oddly placed, on the back of the ear. It is usable while charging, which is better than any other I have or had. However, I got this to use with a phone, and that's where it really falls down. No one can hear me even with the mic gain turned all the way up on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair I have purchased, because someone stole my granddaughters set, so I gave her mine. I was using the skullcandy earbuds but just didn't like the feel. Missed mine. The sound and bass is amazing! Love the 10 hour play and I can walk away from my device upto about 20ft before they start cutting out. Took about 2 hours to fully charge out of the box. Love this brand, definitely compares well to the high end sets!
customer_reviews.author: Sanityplz

customer_reviews.title: Wireless is not as good as the wired version
customer_reviews.text: Wireless is not as good as the wired version. These cost 1/3 more than the wired version, as expected, and, also as expected, cheap bluetooth does not produce as good sound on receivers-end as wired. Plus, controls are weird in that you never really know if it is on or not, and instructions that came with it are not great. Sure, you can turn it on and use it, but if my phone rings I haven't figured out how to make it work right away every time.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain Student

customer_reviews.title: OMG!! Best headphones EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones!! Loud and I can walk away from my phone and never lose reception!! Loud and sounds GREAT!! Great for EVERYTHING!! Get them!! You WONT regret it!! Love these so much I'm getting them in another color!! The battery lasts forever too!! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Snowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life & durability
customer_reviews.text: I wear these to bed, fall asleep listening to podcasts. They've taken quite a beating during sleep and still work, and the battery lasts until morning. These are the only headphones under 30 dollars that have passed that test. Sound quality is just slightly above average for this price range. Skullcandy is a good brand. Works well with a phone or computer. Ear pain wise - I give it a 3. It's bearable, but could be improved. Again, this is the best you'll get for this price range with a battery that lasts this long.
customer_reviews.author: Average People

customer_reviews.title: Happy with some caveats
customer_reviews.text: Most of the time, I like these headphones a lot. However, when I first turn them on I often have trouble getting them connected to my phone. Once they are connected, they tend to cut in and out a few times right after I start using them. Once they've warmed up, they work flawlessly. I can't wear them for very long periods without my ears starting to hurt a little bit, but that's after several hours. The plastic feels a little cheap, but after several months I haven't noticed any wear and tear. It remains to be seen how long they will last. Overall, for the price I'm pretty happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: VStevens

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, my 12 year old loves them.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these for myself to use at the gym but my 12 year old son broke yet another pair of cheap 5 Below headphones. I let him use these and he did not want to give them back. He's been wearing them on his bus ride to and from school, to play on his phone, and listen to music. Our household owns 4 pairs of these headphones and they are well worth the price for a great product. Will be buying myself another pair for the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Chryss

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: My teenager had a pair he received 2 years ago for christmas, but they were stolen so i bought him a new pair. They lasted for about a month in a half and then they completetly stopped working. They turned off, he put them to charge and they never turned on. I have mixed feelings about this product. They worked awesome but didnt last.
customer_reviews.author: Emilly Jasso

customer_reviews.title: Quality Satisfaction!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't too sure about the 10-Hour Battery but sure enough I went almost an entire week without recharging my headphones! Can't say the same about past ones I've used. That's stunning!! The sound clarity is great but I feel they could be a little better. Oh don't get me wrong the bass levels are deep and the sound is quite loud! I love the fact these don't fold. Just simply moving them up & down is grwat enough for me. Someone else might feel differently about these but I love them! I've owned a pair wired headphones by Skullcandy and the sound quality was great on those, so I knew I wasn't going to be let down.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Deal
customer_reviews.text: First pair of over the ear headphones that I've owned and they're great for my first ones! I've had them for almost 2 months already and they've treated me well. 4 stars because the only complaint I have about these headphones is I wished they would get louder. Other than that. I use them when traveling, lifting weights and running. When running they stay put as long as you don't quickly turn your head, no bouncing up and down like I would expect. Other than them not being loud enough for me and can't severely headbang (lol) and maybe a comment that they look cheap and for kids, they're good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Headset in its pricerange
customer_reviews.text: I received these as a gift and I had to buy a wnd one for my wife. Build quality is good and so is the sound quality. 2 things I wish were better, 1-more base (not that its nonexistant but would be nice if it had more) 2- They feel alot tight. Im pretty sure that will change once I wear them a few more times. For the price, I dont think theres any other headset that can compete in this pricerange.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Skullcandy headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these over ear headphones! I’m a small person and they are snug on my head while I work out at gym. They aren’t too bulky. They are easy to use, too. This is my second pair. (My kid lost my old pair.) I tried some of the other Skullcandy headphones and these are my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Minimodernmom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to use these with my Iphone. they work for music, but not for phone conversations, which was my goal. Missed the return date so I am stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: anonymouse

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mother, who is a night owl. She gave them back and said she couldn't hear from them. I tried them and neither could I. They are not stereo headsets and what I did hear through them was very tinny.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried quite a few brands of Bluetooth headphones and these are still by far the best. The sound they produce is excellent considering the price. If you want good, rich sound without breaking the budget, get these! They are also very simple to operate.
customer_reviews.author: CanIGetaZzuuu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are wonderful. Sound quality is crisp and clear. Headphones are very comfortable and I wear glasses as well. Easily paired with my iPhone. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: dtv65

customer_reviews.title: TOTALLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: This product is very nice. If you wanted to get this I would definitely recommend it. The Bluetooth connection is quick. The only thing that I disliked were for the first few weeks I had then they were kind of muffled at times
customer_reviews.author: Christoph

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Bluetooth Headset!
customer_reviews.text: These headsets are amazing! Although small, but able to fit my big head lol. Sometimes it looses the connection when you're trying to speak to someone on certain apps and you have to shut off the headset and turn them back on to properly hear the person on them. But overall I love these headsets and the battery life is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: naruto

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is very poor such that u'll listening all the sounds that are ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my weight training . Sound quality is very poor such that u'll listening all the sounds that are going around .! Don't waste money on it, instead try to add some bucks and go for good stuff. This can be opted only if you wanted give it to your kids.
customer_reviews.author: amazonbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones on the market for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have brought 3 pairs of these headphones! Deep bass, long times of use between charges, crisp audio, you can't go wrong with these. I use these headphones mainly to make beats that I sell for my Production Company and to the NBA and other clients justinmartyr305.com
customer_reviews.author: Justin Francis

customer_reviews.title: My son hasn't heard a word I have said since I bought these
customer_reviews.text: These headphones must leave my son's head at some point to be charged. I understand that, but I have never witnessed it. These have been my child's constant companion since I purchased them several months ago. They appear to be comfortable and drown out annoying parents satisfactorily.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Holm

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Sound Great
customer_reviews.text: These are the lightest headphones that I've ever had and the sound really surprised me. The bass is very rich and the overall sound is great. I've experienced some quick cutouts of sound, but nothing that has diminished the enjoyment from these headphones. I am definitely pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: AD in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Impressive, inexpensive headphones
customer_reviews.text: You really can't beat the quality for the price of these simple wireless headphones. I bought them for work when I was seated in an open cubicle area and I needed to tune out some of the noise. No, these are not noise cancelling, by any stretch, but they do a great job of providing sound and blocking out some of the din of an office. I didn't want to spend a lot of money on something I would be leaving at work, but I have been pleased both with the sound and functionality. And the color is a lot of fun, too!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these headphones! My husband it into running, so I got him a pair of Skull Candy blue-tooth earbuds. He loved them so much, I decided to get myself something similar. I have ear problems, including several surgeries in the past, so earbuds are not an option. I was so excited to find blue-tooth Skull Candy headphones in my favorite color and at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Comfort

customer_reviews.title: ... you are very close to your phone they are great, but if you are a short distance away ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are very close to your phone they are great, but if you are a short distance away they start to static badly. If I have my phone in the cubby holes in the main part of the (open) gym and then go to the weight lifting machines they start to static and I usually end up turning them off because it's annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: Wear all day
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are super. I use these all day and never do they get uncomfortable or hurt the ears. They're light weight, the sound quality is really good and the battery lasts forever. I have listened all day 8 hour work day and forgot to recharge and they lasted all the way to lunch next day and probably more before I recharged. They seem durable as I've travelled with these everywhere .This was an extra pair my first one is 3 years old and still good as new
customer_reviews.author: Ron Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Work great, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Work great brought them on a vacation, they worked great on the plane so I could listen to an audible book and not hear the other passengers or the plane, easy to use and to connect, they were worth the purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Already messed up after a month
customer_reviews.text: I've had them for a little bit over a month and I'm already getting random static coming from them, scares the hell out of me every time. I've tried in several devices and they're all the same. Very disappointed, the whole point of me purchasing one of these is so that I don't have to deal with corded headphones breaking all the time, instead, I spent 50$ on a headset that's already starting to break. I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: I'm wearing it while working from home. No complaints... the battery lasts all day, microphone clear on phone calls, sound great listening to music, easy to pair with my phone, buttons essy to use. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: carlsonfamily

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for a child who breaks headphone cords constantly!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter kept breaking the wire on her headphones so I figured Id go the wireless route. These are well worth the price. Connectivity seems good. Simple to use. Sound quality isn't anything to rave about but for what it is, they're fairly good. Will they win any awards? No. But for a child who tears through cords, I'd recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: AllenTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: ... wait to write a review because I have had bad luck with headphones quitting after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait to write a review because I have had bad luck with headphones quitting after 2 weeks. I have had these for 2 months and used them 3-5 times a week and they are great. Great sound, easy connection, stay on the ear and the battery lasts a long time (still on the same charge over the last 2 months). Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hype. More on the kiddy side devices.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be one of the best headphones. It is not my style, the ear pieces sits on your ear so the music escapes, the feel and design is lightweight so it feels more like its more meant for children's. Not my style of headphones, I like my bass and if I have headphones on, only my music I want to hear.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwana

customer_reviews.title: Beware, Product Not Tested
customer_reviews.text: Product was listed used and in 100% working. This was NOT the case! The right speaker is not working at all and the left speaker pops really badly.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Murray

customer_reviews.title: Dang these things are awesome!! She loves them
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones for my daughter AKA (wire destroyer) She constantly would use mine or my wife's to listen to her YouTube videos. Only to return them mangled and either side speaker cutting in and out. My solution? Wireless! Upon geeking out and researching reviews and ratings these headphones meet my price range and standards. Dang these things are awesome!! She loves them, which means i love them.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: they pair easily with his Galaxy tablet
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 10 year old, they pair easily with his Galaxy tablet. He's used them for quite some time, they are well worth buying. Can't beat the price for the level of quality sound you get. My son like them so much, that I ended up getting another pair for my 7 year old daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Soccer Fan

customer_reviews.title: Expandable headband not quite long enough fo XX Skull. No candy for me.
customer_reviews.text: Expandable headband not quite long enough, needed another quarter inch on each side. The earpads didn't quite reach their intended center-of-ear target on my xx skull. Other than that the candy was good: sound, ear comfort, nice separate tangible controls.
customer_reviews.author: R. P. Henerey

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Game changer. Finally I got headband earphones. I never really liked the small ear pods that fall out. And I like being able to take these off and let them hang around my neck. Phone calls are easy too. I started listening to audio books. I LOVE these. Not too bulky to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: hawaiibecca

customer_reviews.title: Sound goes in and out
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to having these as my desk headphones and after 3ish months they just almost stopped working. They click in and out or just faze the volume out altogether but what you're listening to is still going. They look great as I never wore them outside of my work cube and it's just disappointing (plus, the return window is closed).
customer_reviews.author: kristka

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable headphones from a great brand!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones! They are my 4th or 5th Skullcandy pain in the last 10 years or so. I got these over a month ago and have had no problems. They fit comfortable and I even sleep with them on. Controls are easy, the charge time is fast and battery lasts longer than expected. They sound really good. I have severe hearing loss in one ear, but even I can tell they are well balanced and clear sounding. They dont have any bass distortion as far as I can tell, which is huge plus personally.
customer_reviews.author: R.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Beats...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair I have purchased for friends after I got mine, & use these more than my beats on ear headphones. Great price, excellent sound quality ( obviously Beats are superior) , but unless you're a DJ or cutting an album, you don't need that much audio superiority... These are the best headphones for normal folks who just wanna jam without blowing your eardrums...or your budget.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Battery Life!!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are truly wonderful. The sound quality and battery life is remarkable! I thought I might have a problem with headphones instead of earbuds because of the potential bulkiness or weight. These are super light and very comfortable. They are also very easy to use. I highly recommend them!!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Mundy

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones for running.
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely plasticky, but they sit very nicely and don't hurt after extended listening. I used them for a run in the rain today and all was well. As for sound: they're not as good as my studio headphones (as I was expecting), but the sound really is decent for this price point, especially if you like a bit of a bass boost. It's so nice to be cordless! Don't hesitate to buy these for running!
customer_reviews.author: K. Bandy

customer_reviews.title: I have always had success with Skullcandy products. Love these.
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky what goes on my ears. I wear glasses so headphones needed to be light. These are light and the sound is great. I like the flat speakers. I had in ear wired buds form Skullcandy and they lasted forever. I imagine these will too!
customer_reviews.author: A.T. Hellion

customer_reviews.title: I love them, the sound quality is great and they ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them, the sound quality is great and they really fit well. I don’t like that you can’t skip songs easily and they aren’t especially great for exercise like burpees, they fall off my head. Great headphones though and great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Easy to connect and use and good sound quality. I ended up having to give them away though because they pressed my earrings back and that is kinda painful and annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Daughter get great use with tablet and laptop. Loud enough we can hear if next to. No complaint about comfort and they are still solid after good pre teen use.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price. Great quality sound
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. The sound is excellent and they fit comfortably. Love that they are lightweight for extended use and the battery life is insane. The range is decent, I have a big home and only lose signal in the very front room. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RFM

customer_reviews.title: Could not connect
customer_reviews.text: Although my Bluetooth keyboard connects, the headphones could not and nothing could make them connect to the Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: studioprod.

customer_reviews.title: Really great. Best sound ever
customer_reviews.text: Really great. Best sound ever. Sturdy. They stay on! Battery charge lasts several days with persistent use. They ARE large and boxy, look kinda like an old fashioned set. You can't have everything for this price (mine were $40) and performance is awesome. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps mommy sane and kid music free😁
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Kids can watch their shows without being too loud at night. Great for little ears. We use headphones for car rides and camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: Scooby413

customer_reviews.title: Quality workout headphones
customer_reviews.text: My ears don’t work well with ear clip headphones or the in-ear types, so I needed on ear headphones for workouts. These are comfortable, Bluetooth works well, sturdy, but sound quality could be better
customer_reviews.author: thatsmydog

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 9 year old. Very easy to sync to iPad and chrome book. Very comfortable and the sound quality is very good!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Marchant

customer_reviews.title: Sound amazing
customer_reviews.text: They fit great on a smaller head, they're comfortable, and they sound amazing. My friends say the Uproar's sound better than their $200 beats. Good bass, highs, and balanced out with good mids. Can't beat them for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Overall, A Good Pair of Wireless Headphones for $40
customer_reviews.text: I like these headphones. They have good Bluetooth range and they look nice. The only problem is that there is no AUX port and you have to listen to these headphones at a high volume in order to hear them clearly. These headphones have a good amount of bass though. And one last thing. The plastic is kind of flimsy, so don't try to bend them for fun!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. They are warm, can get a little tight if worn for a period of time and occasionally slip off if I bend over. So, I don't recommend using while exercising.
customer_reviews.author: Halle Scott

customer_reviews.title: Only Lasted 4 Months
customer_reviews.text: These were pretty great headphones- until 4 months in when they stopped working completely. I had no trouble with them up until a few days ago- definitely not the best sound quality, but light weight and fit my small sized head very well.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Iris Iglich

customer_reviews.title: great headphones
customer_reviews.text: The headphone came in in perfect condition. while they headphones don't have insane levels of volume you will be able to block out most sounds. the battery life feels insanely long haven't reach a point where it was going to die on me, by the time my day ends i just charge it and i'm good for the next day.
customer_reviews.author: camian

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in 2018 and they are still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Skull crusher not candy
customer_reviews.text: Tight is an understatement. You will not have to worry about these slipping off because they fit well into the dents they create in the the side of you skull.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great headset!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter 2 years ago and they are still going strong. Fantastic product, I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Zach W

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is great, battery holds up for a few days at ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great, battery holds up for a few days at a time for me, and they charge quickly. These are my first pair of wireless headphones and I couldn’t be happier with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than beats
customer_reviews.text: These work wayyy better than my POS beats. They have amazing sound, don’t fall apart and lasted longer too! Never buying beats again.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: They’re good for the money, they’re sturdy and have not been easily broken like some other cheap plastic ones
customer_reviews.author: pat freeman

customer_reviews.title: BUY!
customer_reviews.text: These things are incredible. For the price, these are an absolute MUST. Super lightweight with fantastic sound quality, including good strong bass. One of the best purchases I've made in a while and I pride myself on getting the best deals. AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.author: Arville Brock-Smith

customer_reviews.title: For $30, you can't go wrong here. Lightweight ...
customer_reviews.text: For $30, you can't go wrong here. Lightweight and conformable. No issues connecting with my Mac or Oneplus. You can switch tracks with a long press of the volume buttons.
customer_reviews.author: RAR

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: If you're not a huge audiophile, these are really good headphones for the price. I listen to a lot of podcasts and music on them, everything sounds great. If you're not looking to spend a ton of money for some wireless headphones, try these first. I don't think you'll be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Champagne

customer_reviews.title: Using for several years still work great
customer_reviews.text: Be careful if headphones are synced and in a bag they can very easily redial your last phone call.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice headphone set for my ten year old. This is his second pair. The first got left on an airplane unfortunately, and he loved them so much that we replaced them. Light weight, battery lasts several days with normal use.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cude

customer_reviews.title: ... 2 months and I can honestly say the work great! The sound is clear and the range is ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had these headphones for about 2 months and I can honestly say the work great! The sound is clear and the range is surprisingly far, especially considering the price. I work in a lab and have to walk around from one work bench to another. I can leave my laptop where it is and the bluetooth stays connected to the headphones even from across the lab. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: hbstreit

customer_reviews.title: Timely and accurate
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid I think this is a very good item. Great sound, good quality, but I think my 13 yr old would destroy them pretty quickly
customer_reviews.author: Lucky63

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice. Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice. Great sound. The fit is good although I have had more comfortable ear pads than these. it is not a major negative, just a small one. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick T

customer_reviews.title: From couch to gym
customer_reviews.text: Light and versatile, I was amazed with the sound quality, and how much bass response these little jewels can deliver. Fit snug but not tight. Perfect for anything you want to do , from sitting on your buttocks to training to become a spartan-ninja.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I have a small head and these fit perfectly on the smallest setting. Great sound. THey dont hurt my ears even after prolonged wear and I have double pierced ears.
customer_reviews.author: RMatt

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Actually for the price these little guys kick some ass. They paired right up within 3 or 4 seconds and sound great. They are a sweet bang for the buck. Comfortable, too.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Great for the gym. I think they have great sound for the price. Battery life is great as well
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Hulsey

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelmed
customer_reviews.text: I returned mine. In fairness, maybe I got a faulty one but there was very little volume and the sound quality was not great. I’ve used Skullcandy earbuds for years so expected the same great sound. Wound up popping $75 for JBL wireless headphones and they are beyond incredible
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! The sound is amazing on it(I'm not a sound tech) plus they are lightweight! Idk what the bad reviews are about because these guys are definitely worth the money! I'm excited to see how my day at the gym goes tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica lowe

customer_reviews.title: 2 teenagers
customer_reviews.text: My 2 teenagers have these. If they can survive over 2 years with them they will be around when the roaches rule the world.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Ear torture
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes (maybe too high for the price) but they were ear torture. I tried them out for maybe 20 minutes and it feels like someone was crushing my ears. Perhaps I have a giant head and if yours is little you'll be fine but pumpkin heads beware!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa grant

customer_reviews.title: Uproar is quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand on my second pair in 10 years will never go away from it
customer_reviews.author: padua

customer_reviews.title: the sound quality is also good and Bluetooth works well
customer_reviews.text: Had it just a day and no complaints thus far. The headphone works as expected. It is pleasantly smaller than it appears in picture (fits on ears rather than around ears), the sound quality is also good and Bluetooth works well. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Herridge

customer_reviews.title: Great audio , battery life and fit for the moneu
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my roomy. It was a suprise. Fit her perfect. Great battery life and sounds just as good as the higher priced version that I have. Would consider gettting a pair for myself
customer_reviews.author: Timothy L Johnson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: HUSBAND LOVES!!! For fathers day and mowing lawns, its great his phone can be in the house and he still has a strong Bluetooth connection!
customer_reviews.author: i.bueno

customer_reviews.title: Great for annoying coworkers!
customer_reviews.text: These are a lifesaver in an open office environment! Sometimes I just put them on with no music as a buffer. Soft and comfortable ear peices and adjustable headband is great. Never messes up my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good one.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Very nicely made, fits well, and is sturdy. Audio is very clear and good. Have used the mic for long calls and works well - most other bluetooth headphones I have tried or used (LG, Bludio) had problems with mic. Battery is good. This is an awesome value. Not flashy but looks good in an understated way!
customer_reviews.author: Desi Dude

customer_reviews.title: Ear Candy
customer_reviews.text: Just got them and live the look, weight and function. They synced perfectly. My only complaint is they are a little tight on my large head.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne MichaelsTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Them!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I purchased these to work out and i LOVE THEM!!! The sound is top notch and they are super comfortable! Plus, who doesn't love RED?! I'm so glad I read the reviews and purchased these for only 34.99!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janine Schoolcraft

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, I gifted them to my sister, and she is happy with them, also nice sound quality, I was waiting something much worse for the price...
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: It looks pretty good and has a suitable battery life
customer_reviews.text: Still works well after 6 months of almost daily use. It looks pretty good and has a suitable battery life. Connects easily to my laptop and phone. Can be used for running.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Fong

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love it. These headphones rock and I will be getting a seconds pair
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Not durable; poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It works great in the beginning. In less than 3 months, the volume control button stop working. I am hoping I can be a replacement, but feeling bad for my son for this is birthday gift that it turned out to a cheap and not reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Tan

customer_reviews.title: Well, they're definitely cheap. They feel flimsy and ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, they're definitely cheap. They feel flimsy and there is no 3.5mm audio connection for a cable? Anyway, upgraded to the Grind and they are solid. yes, they're a bit more, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: seth raye

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I used this for running and for lawn mowing. It’s really great quality.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Democracy

product_meta.title: Skullcandy Uproar Bluetooth Wireless On-Ear Headphones with Built-In Microphone and Remote, 10-Hour Rechargeable Battery, Soft Synthetic Leather Ear Pillows for Comfort, White/Gray/Red
product_meta.description: Color:GraySkullcandy Uproar Wireless Headphones White/Gray/Red, One Size
feature_bullets: EASY ON THE EARS: The synthetic leather ear pillows are so soft that you might forget you're wearing them. Low-profile and lightweight design makes it easy to wear these headphones all day.

LONG LASTING BATTERY: Enjoy the comfort and sound of your headphones for a full 10 hours, without having to worry about recharging. Carefree listening is yours wherever you choose to take your soundtrack.

ONBOARD MIC AND REMOTE: Take calls and navigate your playlists with the built in microphone and easy-to-access buttons on the ear cup. Use the plus and minus buttons to adjust volume, change songs and hit the circle button to answer and end calls or play and pause the music.
BLUEOOTH WIRELESS: Whether you're walking down the street or gaming on the couch, Bluetooth functionality makes it possible to take your audio anywhere you go.
